DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, a.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, a.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR, a.BNFT_CMPNT_DESC_TXT, a.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT, a.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT, a.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD, a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, a.LST_CHG_TMS, a.LST_CHG_USR, a.CREATD_USER_ID, a.CREATD_TM_STMP, a.BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE, a.BNFT_CMPNT_MDNT_TYPE, a.BNFT_CMPNT_ST_CD,b.CD_DESC_TXT, c.CD_DESC_TXT FROM BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ITEM b,ITEM c WHERE a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND (a.BNFT_CMPNT_ST_CD = b.PRMRY_CD(+) AND b.CTLG_ID(+) = 1626) AND (a.BNFT_CMPNT_MDNT_TYPE = c.PRMRY_CD(+) AND c.CTLG_ID(+) = 1939)

select A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_CMPNT_NM , A.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD, A.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR A ,(select BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, MAX(BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR) BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR FROM BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR X WHERE X.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' GROUP BY BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID) AA, PROD_STRCTR_MSTR F where A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = AA.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR = AA.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_NM NOT IN (SELECT a.BNFT_CMPNT_NM FROM PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN e,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a WHERE e.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) AND TRUNC(A.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT) <= TRUNC(F.PROD_STRCTR_EFCTV_DT) AND TRUNC(A.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT) >= TRUNC(F.PROD_STRCTR_EXPIRY_DT) AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE= F.PROD_STRCTR_TYPE AND nvl(A.BNFT_CMPNT_MDNT_TYPE,'NULL') = nvl(F.PROD_STRCTR_MNDT_TYPE,'NULL') AND nvl(A.BNFT_CMPNT_ST_CD,'NULL') = nvl(F.PROD_STRCTR_ST_CD,'NULL') AND F.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.LOB_NM {1} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.LOB_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {1} AND CTLG_ID = 1925)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.LOB_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM {2} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_ENTY_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {2} AND CTLG_ID = 1932)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_GRP_NM {3} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_GRP_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {3} AND CTLG_ID = 1933)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_GRP_NM LIKE 'ALL') ) and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.MRKT_BUS_UNT {4} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.MRKT_BUS_UNT) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {4} AND CTLG_ID = 3470)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.MRKT_BUS_UNT LIKE 'ALL') ) order by A.BNFT_CMPNT_NM

select distinct assn.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,assn.SQNC_NBR from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN assn where assn.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0} and assn.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID in (SELECT distinct C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO A, AVLBL_DOMN B, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR C ,PROD_STRCTR_MSTR F WHERE A.DOMN_SYS_ID = B.DOMN_SYS_ID AND A.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.ENTY_SYS_ID AND (B.BUS_GRP_NM IN (SELECT DISTINCT(avail_dom.BUS_GRP_NM) BGRP_NAME FROM PROD_STRCTR_MSTR prd, ENTY_DOMN_INFO entity_dom, AVLBL_DOMN avail_dom WHERE entity_dom.ENTY_SYS_ID=prd.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and entity_dom.ENTY_TYPE='ProdStructure'and prd.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID= {0} and avail_dom.DOMN_SYS_ID=entity_dom.DOMN_SYS_ID ) OR (B.BUS_GRP_NM = 'ALL')) AND (B.BUS_ENTY_NM IN (SELECT DISTINCT(avail_dom.BUS_ENTY_NM) FROM PROD_STRCTR_MSTR prd, ENTY_DOMN_INFO entity_dom, AVLBL_DOMN avail_dom WHERE entity_dom.ENTY_SYS_ID=prd.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and entity_dom.ENTY_TYPE='ProdStructure'and prd.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID= {0} and avail_dom.DOMN_SYS_ID=entity_dom.DOMN_SYS_ID ) OR (B.BUS_ENTY_NM = 'ALL')) AND (B.LOB_NM IN (SELECT DISTINCT(avail_dom.LOB_NM) BGRP_NAME FROM PROD_STRCTR_MSTR prd, ENTY_DOMN_INFO entity_dom, AVLBL_DOMN avail_dom WHERE entity_dom.ENTY_SYS_ID=prd.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and entity_dom.ENTY_TYPE='ProdStructure'and prd.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID= {0} and avail_dom.DOMN_SYS_ID=entity_dom.DOMN_SYS_ID ) OR (B.LOB_NM = 'ALL')) AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT <= F.PROD_STRCTR_EFCTV_DT AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT >= F.PROD_STRCTR_EXPIRY_DT )

select prd.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, cmp.BNFT_CMPNT_NM from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN prd, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR cmp where prd.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0} and prd.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID not in( select distinct A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR A where A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.LOB_NM {1} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.LOB_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {1} AND CTLG_ID = 1925)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.LOB_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM {2} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_ENTY_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {2} AND CTLG_ID = 1932)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.MRKT_BUS_UNT {4} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.MRKT_BUS_UNT) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {4} AND CTLG_ID = 3470)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.MRKT_BUS_UNT LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_GRP_NM {3} GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_GRP_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {3} AND CTLG_ID = 1933)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_GRP_NM LIKE 'ALL') )) AND prd.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = cmp.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID
select BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN where BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0}

SELECT C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, C.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, C.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, C.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR, C.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT, C.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT FROM BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR C , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR D WHERE D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(E.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR) FROM BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR E WHERE E.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED')

SELECT B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, B.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, B.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR, B.BNFT_CMPNT_DESC_TXT, B.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT, B.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT, B.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD, B.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, B.LST_CHG_TMS, B.LST_CHG_USR, B.CREATD_USER_ID, B.CREATD_TM_STMP FROM BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR A,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR B WHERE A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID ORDER BY B.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR DESC

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateComponents
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT distinct B.ENTY_SYS_ID, B.ENTY_NM from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR A,ENTY_DOMN_INFO B, AVLBL_DOMN C WHERE 1 = 1 and B.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' AND B.DOMN_SYS_ID = C.DOMN_SYS_ID and A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = B.ENTY_SYS_ID and A.BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE != 'MANDATE' and to_char(B. ENTY_SYS_ID) not in (select ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE ='AVAILCOMP' and NOTE_ID= {4} AND NOTE_VRSN_NBR IN ( SELECT NOTE_VRSN_NBR FROM NMST_NOTE_MSTR WHERE NOTE_ID = {4} AND NOTE_STTS_CD != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION'))
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID in (select BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR where BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION' and (BNFT_CMPNT_NM LIKE {0} escape '`' or BNFT_CMPNT_NM LIKE UPPER ({0}) escape '`' or BNFT_CMPNT_NM LIKE LOWER ({0}) escape '`'))

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateBenefitComponent
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: group by BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID,BNFT_CMPNT_NM )) WHERE ROWNUM <=51 order by BNFT_CMPNT_NM asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: checkBenefitComponentDuplicate
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR A, ENTY_DOMN_INFO B, AVLBL_DOMN C where A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID != {0} and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = B.ENTY_SYS_ID and B.ENTY_TYPE='BENEFITCOMP' and B.DOMN_SYS_ID = C.DOMN_SYS_ID

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR ( BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_NM, BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR, BNFT_CMPNT_DESC_TXT, BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT, BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT, BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD, BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, LST_CHG_TMS, LST_CHG_USR, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP, BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE, BNFT_CMPNT_MDNT_TYPE , BNFT_CMPNT_ST_CD) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

UPDATE BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR SET BNFT_CMPNT_NM = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_MDNT_TYPE = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_ST_CD = ?, BNFT_CMPNT_DESC_TXT = ? WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ?
delete from ENTY_DOMN_INFO where ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and ENTY_SYS_ID = ?
delete from NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL where PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCOMP' and PRMRY_ENTY_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select max(SQNC_NBR),BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID from BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN where BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? group by BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: delete from ANSWR_OVRD_INFO where ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and ENTY_SYS_ID = ? and ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID in ( select e.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID from BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN b ,BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR c , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN d ,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN e where b.BNFT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_SYS_ID and c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ?)

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery:
SELECT G.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID,A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, A.PRNT_QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID,A.RFRNC_ID,B.OVRD_ANSWR_ID, D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC,E.PSBL_ANSWR,F.CD_DESC_TXT,G.bnft_defn_sys_id, CASE (SELECT 'Y' FROM note_domain_ovrd_val note,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN admn WHERE prmry_enty_type ='ATTACHCOMP' AND prmry_enty_id = {2} AND scndry_enty_id = {1} AND scndry_enty_type ='ATTACHQUESTION' AND adqm_admn_qstn_nbr=D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND NOTE.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = admn.bnft_defn_sys_id AND admn.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = note.scndry_enty_id ) WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS NOTE_EXIST, DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QSTN_DOMN_ASSN WHERE DOMN_CD IN ('INFO-CC','INFO-SS','C-CNFG','C-MNUL') AND ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR ), 0, 'N','Y') VALID_DOMAIN FROM QSTNR_MSTR A, (SELECT A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, A.OVRD_ANSWR_ID FROM BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD A WHERE A.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = {1} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} UNION ALL SELECT qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, psbl_answr_id FROM (SELECT a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, b.psbl_answr_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr FROM (SELECT a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr FROM qstnr_mstr a WHERE a.admin_opt_sys_id = {0} AND A.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = A.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id UNION ALL
SELECT b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr FROM BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD A, qstnr_mstr b WHERE A.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = {1} AND a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = b.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND a.ovrd_answr_id = b.prnt_answr_id AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = {0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} ) a, psbl_answr b WHERE A.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND b.psbl_answr = 'Not Answered' AND a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id NOT IN (SELECT qstnr_hrchy_sys_id FROM BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD A WHERE A.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = {1} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} ) ) a, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR e WHERE a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = e.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND isdomainvalid ('BENEFITCOMP', {3} ,'QUESTION',A.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id) = 'T' ) B, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR D,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN G, PSBL_ANSWR E, ITEM F WHERE A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = B.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = G.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND G.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = {1} AND D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND E.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = B.OVRD_ANSWR_ID AND E.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = A.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND A.RFRNC_ID = F.PRMRY_CD(+) AND F.CTLG_ID (+) =1938 ORDER BY A.QSTNR_DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SELECT A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID,A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR,A.PRNT_QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID,A.RFRNC_ID,C.PSBL_ANSWR_ID,B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC, C.PSBL_ANSWR,D.CD_DESC_TXT, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {2} AND PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCOMP' AND SCNDRY_ENTY_ID ={3} and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHQUESTION' and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR=B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR and bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={2} and bnft_defn_sys_id={4}), 0, 'N','Y') NOTE_EXISTS , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QSTN_DOMN_ASSN WHERE DOMN_CD IN ('INFO-CC','INFO-SS','C-CNFG','C-MNUL') and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR), 0, 'N','Y') VALID_DOMAIN FROM QSTNR_MSTR A,ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR B,PSBL_ANSWR C,ITEM D,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR E WHERE B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR and C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR and PRNT_ANSWR_ID ={0} and PRNT_QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID ={1} and upper( C.PSBL_ANSWR) ='NOT ANSWERED' and A.RFRNC_ID = D.PRMRY_CD(+) and D.CTLG_ID(+) =1938 and E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} and IsDomainValid('BENEFITCOMP',E.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, 'QUESTION', QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID)='T' ORDER BY A.SQNC_NBR

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: DELETE FROM BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ? AND QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = ?
UPDATE BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD SET OVRD_ANSWR_ID = ? WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ? AND QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = ?

INSERT INTO BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD ( ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID, QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, OVRD_ANSWR_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
